name: Changdong's Bikini Adventure
description:
Bikini adventure with Changdong!

"Welcome to Changdong's worldview."
In 20XX A.D., Changdong purchased Paddedbra 2.0.
But the devil who was coveting it, I was blinded by Changdong's bra!
Changdong leaves for Devil's Castle to find it!

Key features of the game


various monsters
Various kinds of monsters appear in the game, stimulating the players' spirit of challenge. Each monster has its own unique characteristics, making the battle more colorful and interesting.

Millennium Update
Games have also been actively leveraged by Internet update elements in line with the trend of the millennium. Players can receive updates through various online content to meet new monsters and content.

a difficult level
Test players with more challenging difficulty and heartfelt challenges! Let's become a true game master!

Requirements

I took out the foam
Now run the game on a computer with Windows 7 and DirectX 9.0. Changdong's bikini adventure is so light that it goes around without any errors!
